      Methods in platforms that return Platform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Platform MovingPlatform.downBlocked(Level level)
      Determines if the MovintPlatform can move down, based solely upon the positions of other platforms.
      static Platform Platform.getPlatform(java.lang.String token, int x, int y)
      Looks in the types HashMap for a match for the token, and if a match is found, returns the platform created by makePlatform.
      protected Platform MovingPlatform.leftBlocked(Level level)
      Determines if the MovintPlatform can move left, based solely upon the positions of other platforms.
      Platform Spawn.makePlatform(java.lang.String str, java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y) 
      abstract Platform Platform.makePlatform(java.lang.String str, java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y)
      Parses the input and makes a new Platform from the String.
      Platform MovingPlatform.makePlatform(java.lang.String str, java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y)
      Creates a MovingPlatform as specified by str.
      Platform BasicPlatform.makePlatform(java.lang.String str, java.lang.Integer x, java.lang.Integer y) 
      protected Platform MovingPlatform.rightBlocked(Level level)
      Determines if the MovintPlatform can move right, based solely upon the positions of other platforms.
      protected Platform MovingPlatform.upBlocked(Level level)
      Determines if the MovintPlatform can move up, based solely upon the positions of other platforms.
      Methods in platforms with parameters of type Platform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Platform.isCollidingWith(Platform p)
      Checks for a collision with the given platform, use when evaluating any Platform collisions as it allows for more detailed analysis.
      boolean MovingPlatform.isCollidingWith(Platform p)
      Returns if this should react to a collision with p.
